Maher awesome work mate, just a few questions, if i upgrade by running the ISO through windows is it the same as booting and install it that way? if i install from the boot method will i loose my data? i dont really want to format is all.

Thanx mate

@ Blacosta: it's either the CD, HDD or the RAM.
Chekc them one after the other.


@ jugs88: You would lose your data if you install thi windows on the same partition you have your current OS. Wat you have to do is, save all your data unto another drive (slave drive) or external hard drive after then you can do a clean installation (meaning wiping out the old windows and doing a new installation on that partition).

@ Blacosta: it's either the CD, HDD or the RAM.
Chekc them one after the other.


@ jugs88: You would lose your data if you install thi windows on the same partition you have your current OS. Wat you have to do is, save all your data unto another drive (slave drive) or external hard drive after then you can do a clean installation (meaning wiping out the old windows and doing a new installation on that partition).

Anyone know password for the rar?? The website says survey not available in my country..!

1) DOWNLOAD THE TORRENT (.ISO)
2) GO TO GOOGLE, DOWNLOAD A PROGRAM NAME : nLite
3) EXTRACT THE .ISO FILE INTO A FOLDER ON YOUR DESKTOP USING WINRAR.
4) OPEN nLite, BROWSE FOR THE i386 (INSIDE THE EXTRACTED FOLDER).
5) DON'T CLICK ANY TWEAKS OR OTHER OPTIONS JUST GO TO BURN, THEN NEXT, THEN CHOOSE IN THE UPPER LEFT (DIRECT BURN), THEN CLICK ON BURN BUTTON IN THE RIGHT BOTTOM.
6) WAIT TILL IT'S DONE WRITING THE NEW DISC, AND VOILA YOU HAVE A BOOTABLE XP DISC.

IF YOU DOUBT OR ASK ANYTHING ELSE MEANS YOU ARE NOT QUALIFIED TO FORMAT AND/OR INSTALL ANY OS IN YOUR MISERABLE LIFE.

(nLite ISB'T THE ONLY APP TO DO IT, NERO AND MORE ARE ALSO A PLUS, BUT THIS IS EASY AND WORKS FOR ME).
CHEERS
